SELECT HOUB.UNIT_ID, HOUB.UNIT_CODE, HOUB.PARENT_ID, HOUT.NAME, HOUT.DESCRIPTION, HOUB.MANAGER_POSITION, HOUB.COMPANY_ID, HOUB.ENABLED_FLAG, ( SELECT SCVT.MEANING FROM SYS_CODE_VALUE_B SCVB INNER JOIN SYS_CODE_B SCB ON (SCB.CODE_ID = SCVB.CODE_ID AND SCB.CODE='SYS.UNIT_CATEGORY') LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_CODE_VALUE_TL SCVT ON (SCVB.CODE_VALUE_ID = SCVT.CODE_VALUE_ID AND SCVT.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=java.lang.String}) WHERE SCVB.VALUE = HOUB.UNIT_CATEGORY ) UNIT_CATEGORY, ( SELECT SCVT2.MEANING FROM SYS_CODE_VALUE_B SCVB2 INNER JOIN SYS_CODE_B SCB2 ON (SCB2.CODE_ID = SCVB2.CODE_ID AND SCB2.CODE='SYS.UNIT_TYPE') LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_CODE_VALUE_TL SCVT2 ON (SCVB2.CODE_VALUE_ID = SCVT2.CODE_VALUE_ID AND SCVT2.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=java.lang.String}) WHERE SCVB2.VALUE = HOUB.UNIT_TYPE ) UNIT_TYPE FROM HR_ORG_UNIT_B HOUB LEFT OUTER JOIN HR_ORG_UNIT_TL HOUT ON (HOUB.UNIT_ID = HOUT.UNIT_ID AND HOUT.LANG = #{request.locale,jdbcType=VARCHAR,javaType=java.lang.String})
AND HOUB.UNIT_ID = #{unitId}
AND HOUB.UNIT_CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{unitCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
AND HOUT.NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', CONCAT(#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%'))
ORDER BY HOUB.UNIT_ID ASC
